QuestData.Title: Ready for Battle
QuestData.Description: Thanks to your efforts and a lot of effort on the part of our new army, the Nightfallen are prepared for battle.$b$bWhat is more, we have managed to evacuate nearly all of the civilians between here and Astravar Harbor.$b$bI have drafted plans that can lead our combined forces through the city and take the harbor.$b$bCan you deliver these plans to Vereesa, Tyrande and Liadrin?
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver plans to Vereesa Windrunner, Lady Liadrin and Tyrande Whisperwind.
QuestData.RewardText: Well, with these plans and a little luck, we might be able to get through this with far less collateral damage than I would have expected.
